on reading compounds: 首【シュ】counter for songs and poems
首級【シュキュウ】decapitated head of an enemy
元首【ゲンシュ】sovereign, ruler, head of state
百人一首【ヒャクニンイッシュ】100 poems by 100 famous poets, (playing) cards of one hundred famous poems
kun reading compounds: 首【くび】neck, head, dismissal, discharge, firing (from a job)
首飾り【くびかざり】necklace, choker
縛り首【しばりくび】(death by) hanging
